custom-sql.sql: SELECT * FROM cf_project_master WHERE DATE(CREATION_DATE) = DATE (?)
SELECT * FROM cf_project_master WHERE DATE(CREATION_DATE) BETWEEN DATE (?) AND DATE (?)
SELECT * FROM cf_project_master WHERE BENIFICIARY_ID = ? AND DATE(CREATION_DATE) = DATE (?)
SELECT * FROM cf_project_master WHERE BENIFICIARY_ID = ? AND STATUS = ? AND DATE(CREATION_DATE) = DATE (?)
SELECT * FROM cf_project_master WHERE STATUS = ? AND DATE(CREATION_DATE) = DATE (?)
